Here's a summary of the latest updates:

New Features

- Enhanced Markdown rendering with clickable images and improved code block styling
- Infinite scroll feature in the sidebar for more efficient chat navigation
- Admins no longer have default visibility over shared chats when security settings are tightened
- Added Malay (Bahasa Malaysia) translation and updated Catalan and Traditional Chinese translations

Improvements

- Fixed markdown rendering issues to ensure consistent display across components
- Resolved styling issues throughout the application
- Enhanced file interface with file size display for upcoming upload restrictions
- Improved latex rendering processes

Notable Changes

- The "Min P" parameter has been added in advanced settings for customized model precision control
- Custom redirect URI support has been introduced for OAuth behind reverse proxies, enabling safer authentication processes
